pkgmetadata.longdescription: QStarDict is a dictionary program written using Qt4. The user interface is similar to StarDict. Main features are: full support of StarDict dictionaries; working in system tray; scanning mouse selection and showing popup window with translation of selected word; translations reformatting; plugins support;

use.flag: Use app-dicts/wyabdcrealpeopletts pakcage (collection of .wav files) to make QStarDict pronounce English words
